of a person or animal, short and with a wide body: He was a squatty little man, not attractive like his son was to become. Synonyms
squat
thickset
wide and short or low to the ground, sometimes in a way that is not attractive: Each table had a squatty, round, red candle for a centrepiece. Why did we love our squatty little car? Because it was reliable. Synonym
squat
